mapper.insert: insert into review_tbl(rv_num, mem_id, pdt_num, rv_content, rv_score) values(seq_review_tbl.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{pdt_num}, #{rv_content}, #{rv_score})
mapper.select: select count(rv_num) from review_tbl where pdt_num = #{pdt_num}
mapper.update: update review_tbl set rv_content = #{rv_content}, rv_score = #{rv_score} where rv_num = #{rv_num}
